item.name: about_api_center
item.value: The API Center module allows XE admin user add, modify and delete API Items based on extension XE modules.
The API Center module allows XE admin user add, modify and delete API Items based on extension XE modules.
XE API Center 模块使得用户生成，修改和删除站点相关模块的API, 使用这些API，用户可以在其他的应用上获得站点的数据。

item.name: about_api_title
item.value: Please insert API title, which should be different with other API titles.
Please insert API title, which should be different with other API titles.
Please insert API title, which should be different with other API titles.

item.name: about_select_module
item.value: Select a XE module, the modules supported by API center includes Page, Board, Kin(Q&A), Cafe, Project etc.
Select a XE module, the modules supported by API center includes Page, Board, Kin(Q&A), Cafe, Project etc.

item.name: about_select_mid
item.value: Select a Module ID (specific source) based on selected XE module.

item.name: about_select_output
item.value: Select an output data format, XML or JSON.

item.name: about_select_api_method
item.value: Select API Typies (the target data retrieved from or created by API)

item.name: about_add_api_key
item.value: Please insert an API key, generate one if you still do not have it.
